content:
Hi all,
I'm not sure if I've missed something but I'm trying to map from an HL7 V2.4 PID segment into a FHIR resource but cannot find where to map the patient religion.
Any help greatly appreciated.
Many Thanks
Julia
You'll need to use the religion extension http://build.fhir.org/extension-patient-religion.html
@David Pyke Many thanks David for your prompt response, I will look into that now.

@Julia Davis There is also an organized v2 to FHIR mapping project that aims to provide basic mapping. We're not very far, but you (and anyone else) is welcome to join. Check out https://confluence.hl7.org/display/OO/2-To-FHIR+Project as well as the v2 to FHIR Zulip thread.
